title: #15 - Eleanor Ratcliffe
itunes:title: #15 - Eleanor Ratcliffe
description: Dr Eleanor Ratcliffe is a Lecturer in Environmental Psychology at the University of Surrey, specialising in restorative environments, place attachment, soundscapes, connectedness to nature, aesthetics, consumer behaviour, user experience and designing for wellbeing.
